sweep.statement: I sweep this chamber with clarity, continuity, and accountable memory.

signals.statement: Cycle Journal runtime specification established. Lightweight, auditable layer for daily memory.
JSON schema, validation scripts, and GitHub workflows created for PR-based canon updates.
Guardrails implemented: nonce validation, trusted domain allowlist, provenance tracking.

watch_items.note: Cycle Journal runtime provides structured daily memory with audit trail.
PR-based workflow prevents silent edits and unclear authorship.

jade.clarity_improvements: Cycle Journal provides structured format for daily logs, reducing semantic drift.
jade.blind_spots_reduced: Multi-agent lens check (JADE × ZEUS × HERMES) built into template.

zeus.risk_movement: Governance risk reduced through PR-based workflow with validation.
zeus.warning_signs: None identified; system bootstrap proceeding normally.

hermes.beneficiaries: All stakeholders benefit from auditable memory with clear attribution.
hermes.incentive_shifts: Incentive to maintain journal integrity aligned with system goals.

insight: Fear persists where memory fails; accountability is preserved causality.

decisions.decision: Adopt agents-propose, Mobius-Bot-commits pattern for Cycle Journal updates.
decisions.rationale: Prevents drift while maintaining audit trail. Single accountable writer prevents conflicting overwrites.

decisions.decision: Implement guardrails: nonce validation, trusted domain allowlist, actor allowlist.
decisions.rationale: Prevents unauthorized or malicious updates while allowing controlled automation.

actions.task: Test Cycle Journal Bot workflow via manual dispatch
Create first Issue with cycle-journal label for Issue→PR testing
Document workflow in CLAUDE.md for future reference
Refine agent prompts based on initial usage

failure_corridors: Secret leakage: If CYCLE_JOURNAL_NONCE is exposed, unauthorized updates possible
Bot permission creep: If agents gain direct write access, audit trail compromised
chokepoints: Mobius Bot: Single point for all writes (by design)
